testFindAll

public void testFindAll()
testFindAll is already included in testFindById

testCreate

public void testCreate()
testFindAll is already included in testFindById

testFindById

public void testFindById()
testFindById is a test case that tests all the basic functions of the Dao, new object, update, get and delete After the creation of a new Gast, Zimmer, BelegungKopf and Belegung-object the test indicates if the created Belegung-objects exists in the database

testAllInZeitraum

public void testAllInZeitraum()
testAllInZeitraum tests the Dao method getAllinZeitraum After the creation of a new Gast, Zimmer, BelegungKopf and 3 Belegung-objects the test indicates if the created Belegung-objects exists in the database in the specified timeline

testDelete

public void testDelete()
testDelete Test, if a object can be deleted After the creation of a new Gast, Zimmer, BelegungKopf and 3 Belegung-objects only the Belegung (and BelegungKopf)-objects is deleted. The test indicates if the deleted Belegung-objects do not exist in the database any longer The created Gast and Zimmer objects must be in the database.

testDeleteAll

public void testDeleteAll()
testDeleteAll Test, bulk-delete

testBelegungKopfCreate

public void testBelegungKopfCreate()
testBelegungKopfCreate Test, if a gast-, zimmer-, belegung- und belegungKopf-object can be created

testAlleBelegungenVorhanden

                                 throws java.lang.Exception
testDeleteAll Test, bulk-delete After the creation of the necessary objects the test indicates, if the right date values are in the database
